segments.text: Hi . Last month , our company , Turner Interiors of Beijing , ordered some documents under our new L / C . What I want to do is check and see if the documents have arrived yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me find that on my screen ... yes , the L / C is right here . I'm sorry ; the documents don't seem to be here yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dear . When do you think they will arrive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It should be around 5 working days , but different cases take different times . Sorry I can't be more precise .
segments.speaker: S1
